description: Match any words that start with 'b' and end with 't'.
Match any sequence of three digits.
Match all instances of 'file' followed by any number (e.g., file1, file2).
Match email addresses that end with '.com'.
Match all words that contain at least one vowel (a, e, i, o, u).
Match strings that represent hexadecimal numbers (e.g., 0x1a2f, 0x3e4d).
